data.oai_dc:dc: input file 2 for RaxML, mtDNA haplotypes

RaxML input (nexus file type) of concatenated mtDNA (COI + 16S) haplotypes representing Sacoproteus gen. nov. (11 unique haplotypes representing 5 supported taxa) and Placida/Stiliger s.s. species (49 unique haplotypes representing 14 candidate taxa).
